HDG.LOG.content: [Heidegger’s ear] hearing more than just picking up sounds, if it is [anatomical, biological], goes in one ear out the other [but, apprehension lives (lebt) only when embodied (leibt)] > in that case, we are not gathered to what is addressed (Zugesprochene) [heterotautology of hearing and hearkening (Horchen)] > wrong direction: turn anatomical hearing into a spiritual one
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [Heidegger’s ear] hearing more than just picking up sounds, if it is [anatomical, biological], goes in one ear out the other [but, apprehension lives (lebt) only when embodied (leibt)] > in that case, we are not gathered to what is addressed (Zugesprochene) [heterotautology of hearing and hearkening (Horchen)] > wrong direction: turn anatomical hearing into a spiritual one

HDG.BC.content: Nothing “is” turns Nothing into a being? > Nothing doesn’t need beings but it needs Being > perhaps Nothing is the same as Being, it is unique & incomparable: its essence as incontrovertibly incomparable belongs to Being, confirms Being’s uniqueness
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Nothing “is” turns Nothing into a being? > Nothing doesn’t need beings but it needs Being > perhaps Nothing is the same as Being, it is unique & incomparable: its essence as incontrovertibly incomparable belongs to Being, confirms Being’s uniqueness

HDG.WM.content: turn away from nothing into beings: hasten into public superficies of our existence > what testifies (zeugt) to manifestation (Offenbarkeit) of nothing in our existence more than negation? > “not (das Nicht)” more original [?] than negation, negating only one way of nihilating (one way of comporting grounded beforehand in in nihilation of nothing) [annihilation is another way?] > “not” becomes manifest only when nihilation of nothing disengaged from concealment: idea of “logic” disintegrates in turbulence of more originary questioning [has this been proven?]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: turn away from nothing into beings: hasten into public superficies of our existence > what testifies (zeugt) to manifestation (Offenbarkeit) of nothing in our existence more than negation? > “not (das Nicht)” more original [?] than negation, negating only one way of nihilating (one way of comporting grounded beforehand in in nihilation of nothing) [annihilation is another way?] > “not” becomes manifest only when nihilation of nothing disengaged from concealment: idea of “logic” disintegrates in turbulence of more originary questioning [has this been proven?]

HDG.QB.content: re: Jünger on crossing the line [“new turning of Being”]: “this sentence is easy to read and yet difficult to think”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: re: Jünger on crossing the line [“new turning of Being”]: “this sentence is easy to read and yet difficult to think”

HDG.QB.content: Being resides (beruht) w/in the turning (Zuwendung) [of Being] (“turning” a makeshift measure [Notbehelf], worthy of question)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: Being resides (beruht) w/in the turning (Zuwendung) [of Being] (“turning” a makeshift measure [Notbehelf], worthy of question)

HDG.QB.content: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]

HDG.QB.content: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”

HDG.QB.content: in nihilism, fail to heed (achten) what is meant by oblivion of concealment of X Being > turning into essence of nihilism (die Einkehr in sein Wesen): first step prior to leaving nihilism behind, this turning in has a direction of turning back (Rückkehr) [not there yet]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: in nihilism, fail to heed (achten) what is meant by oblivion of concealment of X Being > turning into essence of nihilism (die Einkehr in sein Wesen): first step prior to leaving nihilism behind, this turning in has a direction of turning back (Rückkehr) [not there yet]

HDG.QB.content: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)

HDG.FS.content: nothing in Heidegger not negative, is a nihilating nothing (nichtendes Nichts), its essence turns away from beings: “nothing in its nihilation refers to the being in its manifestation (Offenbarkeit),” “the nihilation (Nichten) of the nothing “is” being” [cf. 58 nihilating nothing as forgetfulness, beings pressing into foreground?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: nothing in Heidegger not negative, is a nihilating nothing (nichtendes Nichts), its essence turns away from beings: “nothing in its nihilation refers to the being in its manifestation (Offenbarkeit),” “the nihilation (Nichten) of the nothing “is” being” [cf. 58 nihilating nothing as forgetfulness, beings pressing into foreground?]

HDG.DL.content: in Japanese, mystery is a mystery when it doesn’t come out that mystery is at work (waltet) [reigns?] [those in a hurry will never notice, slow down] > to guard purity of mystery’s wellspring, hardest of all > but we must incessantly strive to speak about (über) language, though almost (fast) inevitably such speaking turns language into an object (Gegenstand) > p. 51 that would be a position above language, wouldn’t hear from it, would only speak from language
HDG.DL.linkedContent: in Japanese, mystery is a mystery when it doesn’t come out that mystery is at work (waltet) [reigns?] [those in a hurry will never notice, slow down] > to guard purity of mystery’s wellspring, hardest of all > but we must incessantly strive to speak about (über) language, though almost (fast) inevitably such speaking turns language into an object (Gegenstand) > p. 51 that would be a position above language, wouldn’t hear from it, would only speak from language

HDG.LP.content: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]

HDG.LP.content: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]

HDG.LP.content: apartness is active (west) as pure spirit, radiance of blue, kindles (entflammt) a stiller childhood into the gold of 1st beginning > Elis turns his golden countenance toward this earliness, his Gegenblick keeps/guards (wahrt) nocturnal flame of spirit of apartness [what hermeneutic circle names superficially, attention]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: apartness is active (west) as pure spirit, radiance of blue, kindles (entflammt) a stiller childhood into the gold of 1st beginning > Elis turns his golden countenance toward this earliness, his Gegenblick keeps/guards (wahrt) nocturnal flame of spirit of apartness [what hermeneutic circle names superficially, attention]

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself

HDG.WL.content: [re: Ge-stell (Framing)] speaking challenged to correspond totally to Ge-stell, in which all present beings (Anwesenden) can be commandeered, speaking turns to information > informs itself about itself to safeguard its procedures > formalization (calculated availability [rechnerische Bestellbarkeit] of Saying) is goal/norm > even to say that nature of language can’t become part of formalism’s calculations, “natural language” being described negatively
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [re: Ge-stell (Framing)] speaking challenged to correspond totally to Ge-stell, in which all present beings (Anwesenden) can be commandeered, speaking turns to information > informs itself about itself to safeguard its procedures > formalization (calculated availability [rechnerische Bestellbarkeit] of Saying) is goal/norm > even to say that nature of language can’t become part of formalism’s calculations, “natural language” being described negatively

HDG.OHF.content: “phenomenon” will become truly earnest matter if it turns that to be in mode of covering-up-itself (Sich-verdeckens) & self-veiling (Sich-verschleierns) [which constitutes object of philosophy] belongs to Seinscharakter des Seins [withdrawal of Being]: phenomenology in radical sense
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “phenomenon” will become truly earnest matter if it turns that to be in mode of covering-up-itself (Sich-verdeckens) & self-veiling (Sich-verschleierns) [which constitutes object of philosophy] belongs to Seinscharakter des Seins [withdrawal of Being]: phenomenology in radical sense
